info.title: AgilePoint NX
info.description: AgilePoint is a platform that opens up two-way communication to provide native support for flows within larger, more scalable cross-organizational automations. Now you can include important daily tasks performed within Microsoft ecosystem in the big picture processes housed in AgilePoint.

post.description: Creates a process instance for a specified process instance ID and parameters.
Sets a list of process attribute (custom attributes) to the specified values for a specified custom attribute ID.
Retrieves a process attribute (custom attribute) with the specified process attribute ID and process attribute name.

AuditLevel.description: Specifies the amount of process related data that is logged for a process. This property can be set at either the process level or at the individual activity level. This property allows you to control the level of granularity in terms of the amount of process related data that is recorded in the log.
AuditLevel.title: Audit Level

BaseDefID.description: The base process model ID with the specified process model name.
BaseDefID.title: Base Definition ID

CheckedOutBy.description: The user who last checked out the app.
CheckedOutBy.title: Checked Out By

CheckedOutDate.description: The date the app was last checked out.
CheckedOutDate.title: Checked Out Date

ClassName.description: Gets and sets the class name, including the namespace.
ClassName.title: Class Name

CreatedBy.description: The user's name who created the process model.
CreatedBy.title: Created By

CreatedDate.title: Created Date

DefName.title: Process Model Name

DocRef.description: Specifies the URL of a document. This is typically used for internal documentation for a process designer.

BusinessTime.description: Specifies whether the system calculates the duration using your business time calendar.
BusinessTime.title: Business Time

Length.description: Specifies the length of time duration.

ExpectedTime.description: Expected time frame for a process instance to be completed.

InitiateConstraint.description: Specifies whether the process instance was initiated by an eForm, Event Services, or another process instance.
InitiateConstraint.title: Process Initiated By

MaximumSessionAllowed.description: Configures the maximum number of sessions for an activity in a process instance. If an activity runs more times than the maximum sessions, the process is suspended.
MaximumSessionAllowed.title: Maximum Sessions Allowed

OnComplete.description: The action to execute when a process instance completes.

Owner.description: The user name of the app owner.

PreVersion.description: The previous version number of the app.
PreVersion.title: Previous Version

ReleaseDate.title: Release Date

SupplementInfo.title: Supplemental Information

Version.description: The version number of the app.
